dict.acceptation: 助手，助理；[化学]（染色的）助剂；辅助物；店员，伙计；
助理的；辅助的；有帮助的；副的；

sent.orig: It combines four powerful productivity products (File, Write, Report and Assistant) in a single package.
sent.trans: 该系统是把四个功能强的产品(file,Write,Report,Assistant)组合而成的软件包。

sent.orig: School Volunteer: Are you counselor? Assistant coach? Office assistant? Library assistant Assistant teacher? Technical support?
sent.trans: 学校的义务工作：你是辅导员？教练助理？办公助理？图书馆助手？教师助手？技术支持？

sent.orig: Assistant coach Sadi Toma has also disappeared, Iraqi Football Association Assistant Secretary Tariq Ahmed revealed.
sent.trans: 伊拉克足球协会助理秘书塔利克？阿美得透露，助理教练萨迪？托马也销声匿迹。

sent.orig: After that they, the instructor could become an assistant professor. Assistant professors do not have teniertenure.
sent.trans: 然后，讲师可能会变成副教授，副教授没有任期。

sent.orig: Branch Financial Assistant Job Description: As an assistant of branch, report area financial supervisor directly.
sent.trans: 分公司财务助理职位职责：做为分公司的财务助理，直接向分公司财务主管汇报。
